00011 template <typename T>
00012 struct Function {
00013     virtual void operator()(Array<T const,1,1> const & p, Array<T,1,1> const & hx) = 0;
00014     virtual ~Function() {}
00015 };
00016 
00017 template <typename T>
00018 struct Jacobian {
00019     virtual void operator()(Array<T const,1,1> const & p, Array<T,2,2> const & k) = 0;
00020     virtual ~Jacobian() {}
00021 };
00022 
00023 template <typename T, typename Wrapped>
00024 struct WrapperFunction : public Function<T> {
00025     WrapperFunction(Wrapped wrapped) : _wrapped(wrapped) {}
00026 
00027     virtual void operator()(Array<T const,1,1> const & p, Array<T,1,1> const & hx) {
00028         _wrapped(p, hx);
00029     }
00030 
00031 private:
00032     Wrapped _wrapped;
00033 };
00034 
00035 template <typename T, typename Wrapped>
00036 struct WrapperJacobian : public Jacobian<T> {
00037     WrapperJacobian(Wrapped wrapped) : _wrapped(wrapped) {}
00038 
00039     virtual void operator()(Array<T const,1,1> const & p, Array<T,2,2> const & j) {
00040         _wrapped(p, j);
00041     }
00042 
00043 private:
00044     Wrapped _wrapped;
00045 };
00046 
00047 template <typename T>
00048 struct BoxConstraint {
00049     Array<T,1,1> const lower;
00050     Array<T,1,1> const upper;
00051     
00052     explicit BoxConstraint(int m, bool constrain_lower=true, bool constrain_upper=true) :
00053         lower(constrain_lower ? allocate(makeVector(m)) : Array<T,1,1>()),
00054         upper(constrain_upper ? allocate(makeVector(m)) : Array<T,1,1>())
00055     {}
00056 };
00057 
00058 template <typename T>
00059 class Optimizer {
00060 public:
00061 
00062     struct Options {
00063         enum Enum { TAU=0, EPSILON1=1, EPSILON2=2, EPSILON3=3, DELTA=4 };
00064 
00065         T & operator[](Enum n) { return _data[n]; }
00066         T const & operator[](Enum n) const { _data[n]; }
00067 
00068         Options();
00069 
00070         Options & set(Enum n, T value) { _data[n] = value; return *this; }
00071 
00072     private:
00073         template <typename T_> friend class Optimizer;
00074         Vector<T,5> _data;
00075     };
00076 
00077     explicit Optimizer(int itmax, bool compute_cov=true);
00078 
00079     template <typename Func, typename JacF>
00080     int operator()(Func func, JacF jacf, Array<T,1,1> const & p, Array<T,1,1> const & x) {
00081         WrapperFunction<T,Func> wfunc(func);
00082         WrapperJacobian<T,JacF> wjacf(jacf);
00083         return operator()(static_cast<Function<T>&>(wfunc), static_cast<Jacobian<T>&>(wjacf), p, x);
00084     }
00085 
00086     int operator()(Function<T> & func, Jacobian<T> & jacf, Array<T,1,1> const & p, Array<T,1,1> const & x);
00087 
00088     template <typename Func>
00089     int operator()(Func func, Array<T,1,1> const & p, Array<T,1,1> const & x) {
00090         WrapperFunction<T,Func> wfunc(func);
00091         return operator()(static_cast<Function<T>&>(wfunc), p, x);
00092     }
00093 
00094     int operator()(Function<T> & func, Array<T,1,1> const & p, Array<T,1,1> const & x);
00095 
00096     template <typename Func, typename JacF>
00097     int operator()(
00098         Func func, JacF jacf, Array<T,1,1> const & p, Array<T,1,1> const & x,
00099         BoxConstraint<T> const & bc
00100     ) {
00101         WrapperFunction<T,Func> wfunc(func);
00102         WrapperJacobian<T,JacF> wjacf(jacf);
00103         return operator()(static_cast<Function<T>&>(wfunc), static_cast<Jacobian<T>&>(wjacf), p, x, bc);
00104     }
00105 
00106     int operator()(
00107         Function<T> & func, Jacobian<T> & jacf, Array<T,1,1> const & p, Array<T,1,1> const & x,
00108         BoxConstraint<T> const & bc
00109     );
00110 
00111     template <typename Func>
00112     int operator()(
00113         Func func, Array<T,1,1> const & p, Array<T,1,1> const & x,
00114         BoxConstraint<T> const & bc
00115     ) {
00116         WrapperFunction<T,Func> wfunc(func);
00117         return operator()(static_cast<Function<T>&>(wfunc), p, x);
00118     }
00119 
00120     int operator()(
00121         Function<T> & func, Array<T,1,1> const & p, Array<T,1,1> const & x,
00122         BoxConstraint<T> const & bc
00123     );
00124 
00125     void setMaxIterations(int itmax) { _itmax = itmax; }
00126     void enableCovariance() { _compute_cov = true; }
00127     void disableCovariance() { _compute_cov = false; }
00128 
00129     T const operator[](int n) const { return _info[n]; }
00130 
00131     Array<T,2,2> getCovariance() const { return _covariance; }
00132 
00133     Options options;
00134 
00135 private:
00136 
00137     static void _func(T * p, T * hx, int m, int n, void * adata);
00138     static void _jacf(T * p, T * j, int m, int n, void * adata);
00139 
00140     bool _compute_cov;
00141     int _itmax;
00142     boost::scoped_array<T> _info;
00143     Array<T,2,2> _covariance;
00144     std::vector<T> _workspace;
00145 };
